description: The lower house of parliament backs a bill, despite strong opposition from religious groups.
title: Spain moves closer to legalising euthanasia
title_page: Spain moves closer to legalising euthanasia - BBC News
maintext: "It is an important day for all citizens because we are moving towards a more humane and just society. But above all, it is an important day for those people who are in a situation of serious suffering, and it is also important for their families and people close to them," Mr Illa said.
